task.title: Open ports for desktop client access to the data server

p.b: To open ports for desktop client access to the data server on OVA deployed systems, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Log in to the data server as root and run this command:

step.info: In the output of the command, check the list position of the rule that is named PROD-reject, for example, the 6th position on the list.

step.cmd: Run this command: iptables -A INPUT -j PROD-reject
Run this command: iptables -D INPUT list_position
step.info: list_position is the position number of the PROD-reject rule that you determined in step 2.

result.note: These steps are required only on an IBM StoredIQ OVA deployed system. The correct ports are open on an upgraded system.
